title: Can't login/sign in
body:
I get "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists, contact support at support.riotgames.com". Well support.riotgames.com doesn't load either... It loads on cellular data so I contacted my ISP, but they found nothing wrong on their side and suggested I contact the site to check whitelist IPs.

Pinging 104.160.131.3 works though...

Ping statistics for 104.160.131.3:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
    Minimum = 59ms, Maximum = 66ms, Average = 61ms

replies.body: I am still getting the issue. Did you do something to fix it?

Are you still experiencing this issue? If so, I'd recommend working through the steps in our [**Login Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) to address some really common solutions.

Let me know if this issue occurs again for you.

While writing this - support.riotgames.com mostly came back up for me...
------------------------------
Hey - thanks for getting back to me!

Nope, still not working. Here are the results from going through Login Issues Guide (which didn't resolve and I had to use a Google cached version).

Check selected region - Yep, NA

Check if Servers are up - Yep (http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na resolves /shrug)

Sync clock - synced to pool.ntp.org

IE offline - Have IE 11

IE - works and all updates have been applied (ver 11.0.38 kb3203621)

Disable SSL/Enable TLS - done

Also ran Hextech repair; nothing showed up.

---------------
Comcast
San Francisco, CA

Coincidentally, Level 3 were having issues last week a little before all of this started happening...

I'm sorry to hear that you saw no change after taking those steps. I'd like you to [**perform a power cycle of your home network**](http://ypiedtech.weebly.com/how-to-power-cycle-network-equipment.html). Should you still see no change, I'd recommend running some logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can get back to you.

Let me know if you run into any issues.
No change. Followed the guide fully.
Same with me.. I also checked to see if servers were down and they say they are UP... But i cant login, new client and old. Nothing works.{{summoner:11}} {{item:3751}}
just let them work it out. i was pretty pissed too when i couldn't connect to a rank game i just started earlier. shxt happens. :/
Checked Servers are Online 20 minutes ago. I was logged in now its stuck with that unexpected... ? Riot Support any information ?
I am running into the same thing, can't log it at all and keep getting that same error
Same here are the servers down?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
yeah I am getting it to. I lost a damn game because of it!
